SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.jgentleframework.configure.annotation
Annotation Type Annotate

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={TYPE,METHOD,FIELD,CONSTRUCTOR,PARAMETER,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
public @interface Annotate

Annotates members of your class (methods, fields, parameters) or Class with which the container should annotate annotations. In all cases, a member can be annotated regardless of its Java access specifier (private, default, protected, public).

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
Inject

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String[] value
          Indicates the set of annotations which are annotated with.
 
Optional Element Summary
 boolean required
          If specified value is true, the annotated annotation must not be null.
 java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.RuntimeException> throwsException
          This specified exception shall be thrown if annotating process is not completed.
 

Element Detail

value

public abstract java.lang.String[] value
Indicates the set of annotations which are annotated with.

required

public abstract boolean required
If specified value is true, the annotated annotation must not be null. If violates, the specified exception of throwsException() will be thrown at run-time.

The default value is true.

Default:
true

throwsException

public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.RuntimeException> throwsException
This specified exception shall be thrown if annotating process is not completed.

The default value is AnnotatingRuntimeException class.

Default:
org.jgentleframework.configure.AnnotatingRuntimeException.class
